reviews: I really like the length of the shirt. Long enough to cover my belly. I'm 5'7" 170lb and whenever I buy size medium the shirts are a tad short. But these ones have a perfect length.

review_title: I am typically a medium, and the reviews said ...
reviews: I am typically a medium, and the reviews said they tend to fit small so I ordered large. They are a bit too big for my liking, but not so much. So if you're a medium or slightly larger, buy large... If you're on the smaller side of medium, buy medium.

review_title: no suprises same as at the store take your normal size there well ajusted
reviews: i was afraid i was petrified, of them being to small, so i said to my self.. better take bigger just in case, so i took XL instead of L, turns out there too big ,, but you know what, I'll survive. so a suggest you take your regular size the same as always, there not cheapo and are the real size retailed

These shirts fit fantastic out of the package, unfortunately not for long. With successive washings they shrank in length and turned into something that resembles a paper bag. They are tough and as such have been demoted to work shirts (trades). Still looking for a good T that doesn't shrink? Keep looking.

I picked these up as a basic t-shirt. They are a little thinner than I expected but have proved to be a great value. They are holding up well, even after multiple washes. They have kept their shape and color perfectly. Typically, I find shirts either shrink in, or they shrink up, I have not noticed either with these shirts. I am very impressed with these shirts, and they will become my default going forward. Well constructed and great value!

review_title: Paid over 23$ for 5 pieces. Is it worth ...
reviews: Paid over 23$ for 5 pieces. Is it worth? Certainly not. Quality is 2-3/10. I'm giving 2 stars because of fast shipping that's all..

I bought these not expecting too much but new shirts since mine don't fit as I've put on alot of weight. The quality of them is on-par with your average Walmart shirts but noticably thinner, which is good for the summer. They fit well off the start, haven't washed them yet and tried them on (as they're cotton and cotton shrinks a bit), but I believe that they'll shorten up in length a fair bit (they're a bit long) but I would definitely recommend buying a size larger than usual. As of right now I can wear large t-shirts, bordering into XL depending on who made the shirt, and I bought large after reading the reviews about them being somewhat smaller than usual. They fit quite well, but again unsure of how they'll fit after I washing.
I would recommend buying a size larger if your current shirt size is bordering on restricting (shirt doesn't flow freely down your torso) as I believe they'll shrink a fair bit after being washed
Other than those observations I would say that for the price and quality it's worth buying a pack!

The size chart is pretty accurate. I'm a big guy that usually borders on large to extra large. I got XL assuming there would be some shrinkage in the wash. When I got the shirts originally, they were pretty large both in length and width. They did shrink quite a bit in the wash, but I would probably still go with L if I get them in the future. Otherwise, they are nice shirts. The material is comfortable and the colours look good.

review_title: Shrunk a bit after first wash
reviews:
At $20 for 5 shirts, you usually don't expect much and you get what you paid for. These shirts are good looking. They shrunk a bit after the first wash so I'd recommend to maybe buy a size taller if you don't like "slim fit" clothes.

Other than that, the quality is good.

These shirts fit incredibly weird. I ordered XL, I'm 6'1" 250lbs. The shirt sleeves are very long, almost elbow length and the shirt barely goes down to my belt.

The main photo of the shirts shows a longer, more fitted shirt through the torso, which is exactly what I was looking for. These shirts were the complete opposite. Short and wide. Great for getting dirty around the house for when you're doing work but definitely not for wearing in public.

It's nice to find shirts made in North America and that are a great qualifying too! I bought these for my teenage son and he likes the fit and the feel of them. I liked the price and how well they washed too!

review_title: Neck, like every cheap shirt, is trying to choke you.
reviews:
Thick, way too thick, neck hem. Hot and heavy, and cheap looking. Ruins the shirt.

And the hole, is way to small. Are these supposed to be turtle necks? Could pass as a turtle neck.

They fit too far forward, as in, the neck holes are choking your throat, while it's hanging down your back. This, at perfect posture.

I'm 6,2, 160 lbs. These aren't very comfortable. At dirt, can hardly complain, but I'd rather spend $30 on a shirt that was designed to fit the human body.

These are made to a price point, and that's what you will get.

review_title: 5 pack of shirts for the price of 4 from others.
reviews:
Thanks to covid, and me being cheap, all my shirts are fitting a little tight so I bought the xl. I'm 6 foot, 250 lbs, and they fit as a guy who quickly put on weight would expect. And they're cheap, so when I lose the lbs having the motivation to do so, I won't feel bad about these shirts either bring something to do yardwork in, or to trash for rags.

On a note about the quality: I've bought Gildan shirts in the past, they used to be my favourite brand but getting them has always been touch and go, but these are a little thinner material than I remembered. Nothing crazy, but noticable. Probably won't be ordering these again, even when I lose the lbs.

The shirts are decent. I bought large and I find they fit as a large in width and as a medium in length. One out of the ten
is separating on the sleeve seem, maybe an inch, looks like a manufacturing defect. They aren't the softest shirts, I'm hoping that will change after a few more washes. I use them as work shirts to go under my coveralls, for the price I'm pretty satisfied and would buy again.

review_title: Best fitting shirt I've bought yet!
reviews: I typically have a very hard time buying shirts. I have a taller frame, so I end up having to buy shirts a size bigger to fit the length of my body and arms. These shirts fit me very well, long enough in the body while still being a slimmer fit, sleeves are a good length, but I wish they were a little longer. I feel if I ordered a size bigger, the sleeves would have been perfect but the body would have been too wide and long.

review_title: I think the size chart is a little off
reviews:
I am a heavy guy(290lbs heavy) and I ordered the largest size I could afford which was the XL because the XXL price rose up from 19.00 to 35.00.
The shirts fit well enough but when I'm sitting the shirts rise up and it's annoying as heck. I hope they will stretch a little bit if they do then they will be the correct fit. Only time will tell and I will do my best to update this review if anything changes for the better or for the worse. For the moment they seem like a good deal.

review_title: They shrink a lot but other than that, nice shirts.
reviews: I normally wear large t-shirts but after reading reviews about how these ones shrink, I ordered xtra large but they still shrink to a smaller size than a large t-shirt. Almost like they are two sizes smaller than what they say they are. The xtra large will shrink to roughly a medium sized t-shirt. They are nice shirts otherwise. I might trying ordering an xxl size next time if they are available. I even washed a new pack of the shirts in cold water and use very low heat setting on the dryer to see if that stopped shrinkage but they will still shrink after a few wash/dry cycles, even on very low heat settings.

This product must be designed for average builds. I ordered a medium and it is slightly smaller than your Costco medium. After washing it shrank just a tiny bit, but not to the extend of a size down. Fit is perfect - I am average build and not muscular. Light weight too and reasonably thin, yet not transparent. Great for average summer / spring / fall wear.

review_title: Not a great cut for athletic build.
reviews:
If you have a belly to hide, these will be good for you. The chest and waist circumference are identical.
If you're looking for a more fitted shirt than this is not for you.
I won't be returning them since I only use them as house and gardening shirts, and they were a great deal for that ($22 for 5 shirts). The fabric is pretty nice and the stitching seems OK.

Very nice shirts for the money, a little on the thing side, but that's expected for the price. No tags to irritate you. Fit is maybe a little on the small side, but that worked for me as I fall between Medium and Large, so the Large fits just right, not too loose. Much nicer product and better quality than the Hanes shirts that I'd been buying previously.
Nice t-shirts, very good price.

I think this t-shirt is good as under-shirt because it's kind of small, tight fit and light. It feels comfortable because its lightness. I can't comment on it's longevity because I just wore it a couple of times. There are questions about shrinkage and country of manufacturing. My is made in Honduras. I bought small size; the unwashed shirt is 30 inch long. After one machine wash and dry, the length is 28.5 inch.

No dislikes, very comfortable! Very well made I‚Äôm actually ordering some more Gilden stuff love there products they do really nice work for the price they are going to out last lots of my other shirts, thanks keep up the good work Gilden loved your advertising commercial online great products! Also they don‚Äôt shrink much, I like that, and the colour holds great after a bunch of wash‚Äôs.

I've o my tried 3 of the 5 shirts so far with no major problems. The first shirt had some extra thread coming off the bottom seam, but does not seem to be a unraveling problem yet. I would of liked maybe two more inces of length, but that's just a preference. The black shirt attracts dog hair a lot for some reason.

Material very very thin, good for summer, to look at, I usualy wear a large, but with this brand would have needed extra large, not made for heavy work, example mechanics, and I don‚Äôt think you could wear it as a dress t-shirt, because of the pandemic whe are in , I didn‚Äôt return them which I would have done in normal time

I loved these tshirt they were super comfy and everything was perfect the length went just pass the belt line arms were not tight in the pit area like most but when I washed them and by the way cold water no dryer they literally lost a size went from a LG to med so maybe I am gonna by an Xtra LG so when washed it will be a perfect LG because other then shrinkage I love the shirts and I have like 10 of them

Good quality material and high cotton content. Solid colours are 100 % cotton and two of the light grey shirts are 90/10 cotton/polyester. Solid colours are 2 black and 1 a dark grey/green sort of colour. I think that is what is pictured. Gave 4 stars as I think the sleeves are a little shorter than other t-shirts I own but for the price I'm satisfied.

review_title: A little on the small side
reviews: Can't beat the price on these that's for sure. Medium was a little small and they shrink a little more after the first wash. The material is one-half the thickness of a "regular" T-shirt sold by Mark's in Edmonton for $17 (with pocket). They are ok for wearing under a regular shirt though. Next time I will buy one size larger...can't beat that price --- 5 for the price of one...

review_title: Well made and cheap in price.
reviews:
Very happy with my purchase.
Was looking for cheap (in price) t-shirts for the gym.
They look well made and i hope they will last a while.
Anyway, at that price I can't complain much.
I wash them a couple of time and they still look good.

Le chandail noir rapetisse √©norm√©ment √† la s√©cheuse, m√™me √† d√©licat. Au point d'√™tre inutilisable. Les autres couleurs rapetissent aussi, mais beaucoup moins. On perd 2-3 centim√®tres sur la longueur.

wasn't expecting too much from these t-shirts, but was surprised that they‚Äôre not bad at all. The material is pretty soft feeling, which makes them comfortable. I don‚Äôt believe they shrunk too much, at least nothing really noticeable. I‚Äôm satisfied with this purchase and would recommend.

Shirts are actually pretty nice but it does say crewneck shirts and the last one in the bag is a stupid v-neck. Must of been a packing mistake. Now that i wore all of them except this one i don't expect ill be able to return them. I would rate it 5 stars if not that one of my shirt is not what i ordered.

review_title: Good price for the shirts however won't buy again.
reviews:
For the price you can't really go wrong but the shirts aren't that great. The shoulder seems are a little odd. The tightness around your waist and abdomen is a little tight. Maybe if you're a model with a 6 pack it would be a good fit. I'm 6'1 200 pounds with an average build. So take that into consideration.

Won't buy again but I'm not upset with my purchase cause you get 5 semi decent shirts for a good price.

review_title: Good quality, great fit, cheap price
reviews:
I been getting in better shape lately, figured I'd get some smaller shirts than I'm used to to show off a little. The best thing about these is how they're nice and long, so you don't have your gut hanging out if you gotta reach above your head or something lol. I was pretty impressed with the quality when I got them as well, as I initially didn't have my hopes too high considering how cheap they're selling for. Overall, these are likely what I'll be buying from now on.

I read in another review that they shrink after washing/drying but I haven't had that problem.

Wonen shirts are expensive and made from thin material, these are perfect. I bought a pack of medium, equivalent to woman's large (fits 40 D), I loved them so much that I ordered two more packs. Instead of getting two female shirts for 60$, I got 15 shirts.

I found these kind of scratchy and a bit stiff, even after a wash. I think it's because they're 10% polyester, which I hadn't noticed in before ordering. They're also a little tight in the armpit, and the black already looks a bit faded/cheap. Sadly they're not as comfortable or good-looking as other basic brands, like Uniqlo or George.

Size chart shows ladies sizes. fyi: If you would be a size small according to chart, this will give you a close fitting top. If you prefer loose, order the medium. Medium slightly larger & fits loose not sloppy. Feels nice on.
What can I say. Under tee's. Good value. I got 2 black, 1 grey, 2 light or Heather grey? Not sure thr proper color.

C‚Äôest un produit de qualit√©. Le tissu est doux et r√©siste bien lors de lavages. Des √©lastiques aux poignets lui donne un bon ajustement de la longueur es manches. Le v√™tement est chaud sans l‚Äô√™tre trop et absorbe bien l√† transpiration. Super achat.

j'ai pris des large mais j'aurais du prendre des m√©dium car ils sont un peu grand mais c'est pas grave je les garde quand meme , ils sont confortables et la longueur est parfaite , je mesure 5 pied 10 et pese 175 livres

Boyfriend loved them, especially the darker grey colour. They fit him really well, they're decent quality, and the price is right. :)

Hopefully adding weight/ height helps someone out ‚Äî I know he appreciated it!
I take a large size, but these are a bit snug, and you get 2 black, 2 grey, and 1 dark grey.That is it for colours.

I ordered small size. New T shirt fits well but once washed, it loosed from biceps. Cheap material used by Gildan.

Its only good for home wear and you cant wear for outings once its washed.

I purchased H& M Tees. Better buy H & M Slim fit and regular fit ones. Their stuff is far better and fits perfectly well and wont loosen after wash.

This Gildan t shirt is just good for wastage use once washed. Low quality product.

We bought a bigger size and they just shrunk inspite of that too. We bought a large and now it's smaller than a small.

We have use them now that we have washed them already.
I like all most everything. The only thing I would like to see is a small tag or printed name on the bottom of the shirt to be able to tell which is front or back.

review_title: They don't fit anywhere near whats shown in the picture.
reviews: I like a tighter fit around the chest and arms ....I'm definitely bigger than the guy pictured and the arms of the shirts I got have a about 2 inches of loose material!

I bought these for my husband, I could have gone up about 2 sizes to an xxl for the fit because after the first wash they shrunk too much for him to wear comfortably. They are nice looking shirts, just too bad they stunk so much (washed as directed).
Used to wear Medium. But after the last order and this order, I found out they have shrunk the sizes. My old Mediums still fits and now I have to order large. Go figure. This batch (L) fits well.
I bought these Gildan shirts for work as they are very comfortable and last a long time. They fit as expected and are very reasonably priced when buying in bulk. I'm happy with my purchase.

Considering that each shirt cost $4 (5 for ~$20), this is a decent deal. It fits better than other, more expense shirts that I tried in several occasions. However, don't expect a soft touch - it fells a little rough. But overall, you get more than you pay for.

Les t shirts sont les meilleurs rapport qualit√© prix trouv√© depuis longtemps. Ils sont l√©g√®rement plus long que la normal donc m√™me apr√®s un lavage ils sont toujours ajust√© et ne sont pas trop petit lorsqu'on l√®ve les bras.

review_title: Doesn't match with description or picture.
reviews: In the picture it shows the shirts are long enough compared to width. However, I feel like I am a round person when I wear it. I need XL shirts and the ones I get from local shops fits properly. At least doesn't make me look round! It feels like this product is just a piece of rounded cloth with neck & hand holes in it.

review_title: You get what you pay for.
reviews: Poor quality. Lost their shape pretty quickly. Now make me look sloppy and skinny at the same time. Unwearable after a few months. Just buy better t-shirts. Their boxers and socks are good though..

review_title: Fit is fine, price is right, quality is not what I remember
reviews: 2 of my 5 shirts already have popped seams in the armpit area. These shirts are not a tight fit, and I'm not an active person (mild/no wear and tear).. Gildan is certainly not what it used to be in the past. Would not buy again.

This is a remarkably good value, which is sometimes interpreted as cheap or substandard or poorly made. These T-shirts are top quality cotton/cotton blend, well sewn and fit true to size. I‚Äôm so pleased I‚Äôll be ordering again.

Pour le prix j'esp√©rais pas recevoir quelque chose d'aussi bien. Premi√®re fois que je commande des hauts sur internet et je suis vraiment pas d√©√ßu! La qualit√© est robuste, et la coupe me va comme un gant!

These shirts are pretty decent and a good buy for the price.

I wear medium shirts and these seem to run a tad bit on the smaller side. The sleeves could be longer. But overall money well spent.

Purchased these for work and are holding up great so far!
Ok shirts...if plain is what you seek. The bottoms of the shirts fold up on me, so i probably will never wear this outside the house. Keep in mind they shrink in the washer, so buy bigger.

Purchased for me son. He seems to love these shirts. Great price-quality point and very utilitarian which is what they needed to be. Washed up wonderfully with very minor shrinkage. Solid purchase on all fronts.
I bought these for my husband for around the house, but they are so comfy, and look really good that he wears them as everyday shirts! Well, when I haven‚Äôt worn them all. (Seriously comfy!!)

Because of my height usually when I buy shirts they tend to not be long enough but these are amazing! Good quality! Would recommend!

Edit: after washing and drying they shrink to an unusable size :(

By the other reviews I can tell the quality of this shirts was as I expected, but I got the delivery for next day after my purchase, and they didn‚Äôt come on time. I had to go on a trip and I couldn‚Äôt have them on time, so I had to run to a store to buy more expensive stuff. I wish I could enjoy them as the other people did, but they didn‚Äôt get to me

Thought i'd order XL as these days L may fit as a small if made in China. These are made in Honduras and really large sized so order accordingly.
They looked great coming out of the package, but they shrunk quite a bit after being washed. They still fit but are a bit tight.
Ordered extra large so I can wear as a night gown as I love long oversized shirt and I did not want to borrow my hubby's and these are great!!! Comfortable and cozy.

Shirts fit as expected. They are very soft, breathable, and comfortable. Furthermore they are ‚Äútag-less‚Äù which is a nice addition adding to the comfort level.

These t-shirts are a good quality especially for the price. It's nice to have a variety of colors as well.

No really though I do not recommend anyone to buy this unless you don't care about the feel of the t-shirt.
